item.description:
What an Awesome, Fantastic, Great Group of Cribbage Players we are!

A new Ellen from Somerville shows up and beats Bette and then Gabe and then our first Ellen beats the new Ellen and Dave !!

And I, of course, beat Gabe (so what if he was in the dead hole) and beat Karen also and T*H*E*N Bette SKUNKS both Dave and Micki; and then Bette said GOTCHA! - BUT, only after Micki Screamed Out Loud about this happening event, because I had her as I was supposed to count first and then she holds out on two 8's to WIN in pegging

The food was great, the coffee excellent and, of course, the Tiramasu was the B*E*S*T !!

Come on down everyone - I won't be around on the 19th as I will be in FLorida visiting my sister, but Bette is going to fill in for me and we ALL know how much Bette loves to play CRIBBAGE ! ! and W*I*N* - not quiet, shy, modest and retiring like M*E*.....
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Back Room with our Cribbage Boards out !!
item.name: Waltham Cribbage - Have a Great Memorial Day Weekend Without Micki
